text: We love what CPK did for 24 hours of booty. They were willing to donate 20% of each of their checks towards cancer research. …More

text: My service was good.  Food was so-so.  My food came out cold.  Dinning room looked shabby and not well maintained (stains on the booth, dirty floors).  For a higher end resturant that serves $30 entrees I expect a better atmosphere.  I'm not in a hurry to go back.

text: The service was great and the pizza I ordered was easily the best I've had. Nice open kitchen too.

text: As a vegan dining here my experience was superb. Service was fast friendly knowledgeable. Food was off the chain. The guac+chips were nirvana. And I got pasta that hit the spot. Server offered bread which I accepted, and it made everything even better. Would return in a heartbeat.

text: Great spot for an after mall dinner. Nothing special but definitely not average. Pizza was great but all in all it was just good.

text: Had a great lunch at CPK today. The bartender Luis took great care of me and was very attentive. The food came fast and was delicious, and the manager Chaz even stopped by to make sure every thing was good. Amazing staff and great food! Definitely will be back!
